actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Committee on Armed Services. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Armed Services. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Armed Services. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 2248 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1982 for the Armed  Forces for procurement, for research, development, test, and evaluation, and for operation and maintenance, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Defense Supplemental Authorization Act, 1982

summary.text: Department of Defense Supplemental Authorization Act, 1982 - Title I: Procurement - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for FY 1982 for the armed forces for procurement. Title II: Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for FY 1982 for the armed forces for research, development, test, and evaluation. Title III: Operation and Maintenance - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for FY 1982 for the armed forces and other activities and agencies of the Department of Defense for operation and maintenance. Title IV: Active Forces - Increases the active duty end strength of the Army for FY 1982.

titles.title: Department of Defense Supplemental Authorization Act, 1982

A bill to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1982 for the Armed  Forces for procurement, for research, development, test, and evaluation, and for operation and maintenance, and for other purposes.
